text: Hi everyone, I'm confused on how to add a functionality on my custom module. I want to use a JS library like this <https://swiperjs.com/>. Can anyone help me on how to use this functionality on my custom module>
I use swiperjs too. Do you want to use it in just a single custom module, or broader in your site?
Hi Erik, In my case i want to use the custom module to another website pages.
